title: Japan's low-crime image cracking as car thefts, home intrusions rise
description: Japan has often prided itself on its orderly, low-crime society, but cracks in that image are widening amid rising car thefts and home intrusions fueled by export markets and public complacency.

title: Lawmakers sound alarm over report on Hegseth’s boat strike order — ‘This rises to the level of a war crime if it’s true’
description: The Washington Post reported that Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth issued a verbal order for all crew members to be killed as part of a Sept. 2 attack.

title: London councils enact emergency plans after three hit by cyber-attack
description:
Kensington and Westminster councils investigating whether data has been compromised as Hammersmith and Fulham also reports hack
Three London councils have reported a cyber-attack, prompting the rollout of emergency plans and the involvement of the National Crime Agency (NCA) as they investigate whether any data has been compromised.
The Royal Borough of Kensington and Chelsea (RBKC), and Westminster city council, which share some IT infrastructure, said a number of systems had been affected across both authorities, including phone lines. The councils shut down several computerised systems as a precaution to limit further possible damage.
 Continue reading...

title: 'Walking Tall' sheriff Buford Pusser was hailed as a crime-busting hero. What if he was the killer all along?
description: Sheriff Buford Pusser's feats in Tennessee inspired the "Walking Tall" movies, plus books and songs. A new report suggests he killed his wife.

title: Seven years on the run to fighting in the UFC - Rock's remarkable journey
description: Shem Rock went on the run for seven years after being arrested for a crime he did not commit - now he is set to make his UFC debut.
